doc.field: Town of Southampton School District No. 1 daily school registers
Town of Southampton School District No. 1 daily school registers

Three daily school registers of the Town of Southampton School District No. 1 in Suffolk County, N.Y. for the school years lasting from 1878 to 1879, 1887 to 1888, and 1888 to 1889. The registers include lists of students over the age of five and under the age of 21 in the district, lists of the parents or guardians of each student, names of the towns in which the students reside, each student's date of enrollment, and records of attendance.
